client/src/components/ui/checkbox.tsx.content:
import * as React from "react"
import * as CheckboxPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-checkbox"
import { Check } from "lucide-react"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const Checkbox = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof CheckboxPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof CheckboxPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
  <CheckboxPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn(
      "peer h-4 w-4 shrink-0 rounded-sm border border-primary ring-offset-background focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 data-[state=checked]:bg-primary data-[state=checked]:text-primary-foreground",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <CheckboxPrimitive.Indicator
      className={cn("flex items-center justify-center text-current")}
    >
      <Check className="h-4 w-4" />
    </CheckboxPrimitive.Indicator>
  </CheckboxPrimitive.Root>
))
Checkbox.displayName = CheckboxPrimitive.Root.displayName

export { Checkbox }

)) NavigationMenuViewport.displayName = NavigationMenuPrimitive.Viewport.displayName const NavigationMenuIndicator = React.forwardRef< React.ElementRef, React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef >(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
)) NavigationMenuIndicator.displayName = NavigationMenuPrimitive.Indicator.displayName export { navigationMenuTriggerStyle, NavigationMenu, NavigationMenuList, NavigationMenuItem, NavigationMenuContent, NavigationMenuTrigger, NavigationMenuLink, NavigationMenuIndicator, NavigationMenuViewport, }

client/src/components/ui/slider.tsx.content:
import * as React from "react"
import * as SliderPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-slider"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const Slider = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof SliderPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof SliderPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
  <SliderPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn(
      "relative flex w-full touch-none select-none items-center",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <SliderPrimitive.Track className="relative h-2 w-full grow overflow-hidden rounded-full bg-secondary">
      <SliderPrimitive.Range className="absolute h-full bg-primary" />
    </SliderPrimitive.Track>
    <SliderPrimitive.Thumb className="block h-5 w-5 rounded-full border-2 border-primary bg-background ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50" />
  </SliderPrimitive.Root>
))
Slider.displayName = SliderPrimitive.Root.displayName

export { Slider }

client/src/components/ui/progress.tsx.content:
"use client"

import * as React from "react"
import * as ProgressPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-progress"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const Progress = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ProgressPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ProgressPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, value, ...props }, ref) => (
  <ProgressPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn(
      "relative h-4 w-full overflow-hidden rounded-full bg-secondary",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <ProgressPrimitive.Indicator
      className="h-full w-full flex-1 bg-primary transition-all"
      style={{ transform: `translateX(-${100 - (value || 0)}%)` }}
    />
  </ProgressPrimitive.Root>
))
Progress.displayName = ProgressPrimitive.Root.displayName

export { Progress }

client/src/components/ui/scroll-area.tsx.content:
import * as React from "react"
import * as ScrollAreaPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-scroll-area"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const ScrollArea = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, children, ...props }, ref) => (
  <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn("relative overflow-hidden", className)}
    {...props}
  >
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Viewport className="h-full w-full rounded-[inherit]">
      {children}
    </ScrollAreaPrimitive.Viewport>
    <ScrollBar />
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Corner />
  </ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>
))
ScrollArea.displayName = ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root.displayName

const ScrollBar = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>
>(({ className, orientation = "vertical", ...props }, ref) => (
  <ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar
    ref={ref}
    orientation={orientation}
    className={cn(
      "flex touch-none select-none transition-colors",
      orientation === "vertical" &&
        "h-full w-2.5 border-l border-l-transparent p-[1px]",
      orientation === "horizontal" &&
        "h-2.5 flex-col border-t border-t-transparent p-[1px]",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaThumb className="relative flex-1 rounded-full bg-border" />
  </ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>
))
ScrollBar.displayName = ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar.displayName

export { ScrollArea, ScrollBar }

className, children, position = "popper", ...props }, ref) => ( {children} )) SelectContent.displayName = SelectPrimitive.Content.displayName const SelectLabel = React.forwardRef< React.ElementRef, React.ElementRef, React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef >(({ className, ...props }, ref) => ( )) SelectSeparator.displayName = SelectPrimitive.Separator.displayName export { Select, SelectGroup, SelectValue, replit.md.content:
# VIAVIP

## Overview
Next.js 16 application with App Router, using Supabase as backend. The project serves as a premium classified ads platform for verified escorts in Uruguay. Features include multi-step registration with identity verification, admin verification panel, paid plans system, metrics dashboard, and restricted publishing. Premium black + gold (#c6a75e) visual identity.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 16 with App Router (Turbopack)
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Custom CSS (dark theme #0a0a0a, gold accent #c6a75e), no UI component libraries
- **Fonts**: Playfair Display (headings), Inter (body)
- **Backend**: Supabase (client configured in `lib/supabaseClient.ts`)
- **Port**: 5000

## Project Structure
```
app/
  layout.tsx                    # Root layout with Header + BottomNav
  page.tsx                      # Home (server: data fetching, delegates to HomeClient)
  components/HomeClient.tsx      # Home client (filter pills, hero, info block, stories, grids)
  globals.css                   # Global styles (vv- prefix, premium dark+gold theme)
  components/Header.tsx         # Sticky header with hamburger, VIAVIP logo, side menu
  components/BottomNav.tsx      # Bottom navigation (Inicio, Favoritos, Estadisticas, Perfil)
  components/ListadoPage.tsx    # Shared listing component (filters by categoria)
  components/PerfilView.tsx     # Shared profile view (validates categoria, shows real service data)
  mujeres/page.tsx              # Listado mujeres (categoria='mujer')
  mujeres/[id]/page.tsx         # Perfil mujer (tabbed: Principal, Info, Opiniones)
  hombres/page.tsx              # Listado hombres (categoria='hombre')
  hombres/[id]/page.tsx         # Perfil hombre (tabbed)
  trans/page.tsx                # Listado trans (categoria='trans')
  trans/[id]/page.tsx           # Perfil trans (tabbed)
  login/page.tsx                # Login
  registro/page.tsx             # Multi-step registration with verification + categoria selection
  publicar/page.tsx             # 2-step publish form (Principal + Servicios)
  planes/page.tsx               # Plan selection page (Plus/Platino/Diamante)
  metricas/page.tsx             # Metrics dashboard (Platino/Diamante only)
  mi-cuenta/page.tsx            # User account with plan info, verification, actions
  admin/verificaciones/page.tsx # Admin panel to approve/reject verifications
lib/
  supabaseClient.ts             # Supabase client helper (returns null if env vars missing)
  supabasePublic.ts             # Supabase public client for server-side queries
  plans.ts                      # Plan configuration (Free/Plus/Platino/Diamante)
```

## Design System
- **CSS prefix**: `vv-` (all class names)
- **Primary background**: #0a0a0a
- **Card background**: #141414
- **Gold accent**: #c6a75e
- **Gold gradient**: linear-gradient(135deg, #c6a75e 0%, #a8893f 100%)
- **WhatsApp green**: #25d366
- **Verification green**: #22c55e (used in registration flow only)
- **Typography**: Playfair Display serif for titles, Inter for body
- **Navigation**: Hamburger side menu + bottom nav bar (4 items)

## Plans System
4 tiers: Free (7-day trial), Plus ($990/mo), Platino ($1990/mo), Diamante ($3990/mo)
- Each plan has photo/video limits, ranking priority, and metrics access
- Listings sorted by: Diamante > Platino > Plus > Free, then by rating
- Metrics available for Platino (basic) and Diamante (full panel)
- Plan badges with gold gradients shown on listing cards
- Simulated payment (ready for Stripe integration)

### Plan Limits
| Plan     | Fotos | Videos | Metricas     | Ranking |
|----------|-------|--------|--------------|---------|
| Free     | 3     | 0      | No           | Bajo    |
| Plus     | 8     | 1      | No           | Normal  |
| Platino  | 15    | 3      | Basicas      | Boost   |
| Diamante | Ilim  | Ilim   | Completas    | Max     |

## Category System
- Users select their category (mujer/hombre/trans) during registration
- Category is stored in both `profiles` and `publicaciones` tables
- Listing pages filter by categoria: /mujeres  mujer, /hombres  hombre, /trans  trans
- Profile pages validate that the publicacion matches the expected category

## Publish Form (2-step)
- Step 1 "Principal": nombre*, edad*, descripcion*, departamento*, zona*, atiende_en*, cover_url, altura_cm, peso_kg, horarios, tarifa_hora, acepta_usd, disponible, rating
- Step 2 "Servicios": servicios[], sexo_oral[], fantasias[], servicios_virtuales[], tipos_masajes[], idiomas[] (chip selectors)
- Categoria is auto-set from the user's profile
- On save, redirects to the listing page matching the user's category

## Registration Flow
1. Signup (email/password + categoria selection)  creates auth user + profiles row with verificacion_estado='pendiente'
2. Welcome screen explaining the 3-step verification process
3. Document type selection (cedula/pasaporte/licencia)
4. Camera permission request (WebRTC)
5. Document capture (frente + dorso)  uploaded to Supabase Storage bucket "verificaciones"
6. Selfie capture  sets verificacion_estado='en_revision'
7. Done screen  redirects to Mi Cuenta

## Verification States
- `pendiente` - Just registered, hasn't started verification
- `en_revision` - Verification submitted, waiting for admin review
- `aprobado` - Admin approved, user can publish
- `rechazado` - Admin rejected

## Supabase Tables Required
### profiles
- id (uuid, PK, references auth.users)
- email (text)
- categoria (text: mujer/hombre/trans, default 'mujer')
- verificacion_estado (text: pendiente/en_revision/aprobado/rechazado)
- tipo_documento (text: cedula/pasaporte/licencia)
- doc_frente_url (text)
- doc_dorso_url (text)
- selfie_url (text)
- fecha_verificacion (timestamptz)
- is_admin (boolean, default false)
- plan_actual (text: free/plus/platino/diamante)
- plan_estado (text: activo/vencido/cancelado)
- plan_inicio (timestamptz)
- plan_fin (timestamptz)
- trial_usado (boolean, default false)
- stripe_customer_id (text, nullable)
- stripe_subscription_id (text, nullable)

### publicaciones
- id (uuid, PK)
- user_id (uuid, references auth.users, unique)
- categoria (text: mujer/hombre/trans)
- nombre, edad, ciudad, zona, departamento, descripcion, cover_url, disponible, rating
- altura_cm (int), peso_kg (int), atiende_en (text), horarios (text)
- tarifa_hora (int), acepta_usd (boolean)
- telefono (text, nullable)
- servicios (text[]), sexo_oral (text[]), fantasias (text[])
- servicios_virtuales (text[]), tipos_masajes (text[]), idiomas (text[])

### reports
- id (uuid, PK, default gen_random_uuid())
- publicacion_id (uuid, references publicaciones.id)
- reason (text: spam/contenido_falso/menor/otro)
- details (text, nullable)
- reporter_user_id (uuid, nullable)
- created_at (timestamptz, default now())

### comments
- id (uuid, PK, default gen_random_uuid())
- publicacion_id (uuid, references publicaciones.id)
- user_id (uuid, nullable)
- text (text)
- created_at (timestamptz, default now())

### profile_metrics
- id (uuid, PK)
- profile_id (uuid, references profiles.id)
- fecha (date)
- visitas (integer, default 0)
- clicks_whatsapp (integer, default 0)
- favoritos (integer, default 0)

### Storage Bucket
- "verificaciones" bucket for document/selfie images

## Scripts
- `npm run dev` - Start dev server on port 5000
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run start` - Start production server on port 5000

## Environment Variables
- `NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL` - Supabase project URL
- `NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY` - Supabase anonymous key

## Recent Changes
- Feb 2026: Complete rebrand from "Limbo Uruguay" to "VIAVIP"
- Feb 2026: Premium black+gold design system with Playfair Display headings
- Feb 2026: Plans renamed: Free/Plus ($990)/Platino ($1990)/Diamante ($3990)
- Feb 2026: New navigation: hamburger side menu + bottom nav bar
- Feb 2026: Home page with hero, disponibles ahora, premium carousel, nuevas esta semana
- Feb 2026: Profile pages with tabs (Principal, Info, Opiniones) + WhatsApp/Llamar
- Feb 2026: All CSS classes migrated from limbo- prefix to vv- prefix
- Feb 2026: Registration/verification uses green (#22c55e) accent, not gold
- Feb 2026: Added categoria column (mujer/hombre/trans) to profiles and publicaciones
- Feb 2026: Listing pages now filter by categoria (mujeres/hombres/trans)
- Feb 2026: Shared ListadoPage component eliminates code duplication across listing pages
- Feb 2026: Profile view validates categoria match and shows real service data from DB
- Feb 2026: 2-step Publicar form (Principal + Servicios) with chip selectors for service arrays
- Feb 2026: Registration now includes categoria selection (mujer/hombre/trans)
- Feb 2026: Limbo-style profile pages: full-width cover image with gradient overlay, name/age/location on image
- Feb 2026: Working WhatsApp (wa.me) + Llamar (tel:) buttons, disabled when no phone number
- Feb 2026: Sticky WhatsApp button at bottom (above bottom nav) when phone exists
- Feb 2026: Favorites system using localStorage (heart icon with fill animation)
- Feb 2026: Image lightbox (tap cover to view full-screen, click outside to close)
- Feb 2026: Report modal with 4 reasons (spam/contenido_falso/menor/otro) + details
- Feb 2026: Comments system (text input, reverse chronological, formatted dates es-UY)
- Feb 2026: Telefono field added to publicar form and publicaciones table
- Feb 2026: Press feedback on all interactive buttons (scale + brightness transforms)
- Feb 2026: Reports and comments tables added to Supabase schema
- Feb 2026: Home page split into server (page.tsx) + client (HomeClient.tsx) for interactivity
- Feb 2026: Filter pills bar (Mujeres/Trans/Hombres/PdE/MVD) added to home page
- Feb 2026: Info block with 3 columns + expandable "Ver mas" toggle
- Feb 2026: Destacadas stories carousel (pink-to-gold gradient border circles) for diamante/platino
- Feb 2026: Heart/favorites icon added to header navigation
- Feb 2026: WhatsApp URL now includes ?text= message parameter

## User Preferences
- No demo mode, real Supabase data only
- Supabase client used directly (no API routes)
- One publication per user (user_id unique in publicaciones)
- Mobile-first design
- Premium dark theme (#0a0a0a background, #c6a75e gold accent)
- Payments simulated now, prepared for Stripe integration later
- Registration flow styled clean (green accents, no gold)

{children}
 )) AccordionContent.displayName = AccordionPrimitive.Content.displayName export { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionTrigger, AccordionContent }
